text: Waɗiree Jihaadi fii Alla no Jihaadi haaniri non, Kanko O Suɓike on O waɗanaali on ɓitteende ka nder Diina, Diina baaba mooɗon Ibraahiima ko Kanko inni on julɓe ko adii [ndee Alqur'aanaare] e nder mayre kadi, fii yo Nulaaɗo on laato seedo e hoore-mo'on onon kadi wonon seeditoytooɓe e hoore yimɓe ɓen. Ñiiɓnee e Julde nden totton Jakka on jogitee Alla, ko Kanko woni Giɗo mooɗon moƴƴii giɗo moƴƴii walloowo on
